 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָהָה‎</span> **verb** ==wail, lament== (probably onomatopoetic, compare [[BDB#Sta|Sta]]<sup>Geschichte. i. 388</sup>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (in Lexicons); Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">: is ***recreari, respirare***, etc. [[BDB#Di|Di]]<sup>632</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְנָהָה‎</span> [[Mic.2.4|Mic 2:4]] lament followed by accusative of congnate meaning with verb; ***Imperative*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְהֵה‎</span> [[Ezek.32.18|Ezek 32:18]], followed by<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> ***concerning, for.*** **Niph\`al** ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּנָּהוּ‎</span> [[1Sam.7.2|1Sam 7:2]] followed by<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַהֲרִי‎</span> ***went mourning after*** (so most, compare [[BDB#The|Th]] [[BDB#Dr|Dr]], who argue against [[BDB#Thes|Thes]] ***were gathered***), &lt; read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ויפנ(הׅ‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּפְנוּ‎</span> ***turned after*** = ***submitted*** to (as [[Ezek.29.16|Ezek 29:16]]) [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] (perhaps), [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Kit|Kit]] [[BDB#Bu|Bu]] [[BDB#HPS|HPS]].
